p: A revisit of the chemical profile ( Figure 5) suggests that compounds present between retention times 1 and 3 min are ellagitannins and lignans, while compounds that eluted between 3 and 6 min are triterpenoids and saponins. Therefore, it can be concluded that active Class 1 samples ( Figure 3) contain mainly triterpenes and saponins, while less active Class 2 samples contain mainly ellagitannins and lignans.
